website_summaries.verdict: One of the few strap designs that focuses on both core and back development.
pros: We love the front and back workout this strap supports
Doesn't pull on joints and instead focuses on major muscle groups
Works well for both men and women and people of varying sizes
cons: Some small pieces may be missing

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW ~ I read (mostly good, but) mixed reviews prior to purchase. Just received and unboxed these straps and I am blown away!! Carabiners and straps are both HEAVY DUTY. Carabiners are HUGE and will easily fit around pull-up bar. Straps are substantive and well made, which will easily support my 230 lb. frame. My thanks for a quality product!!
customer_reviews.author: John J.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: I have used straps like these that were narrower, and they cut into my arms-even with me holding on to them. These are perfect for me, and I use them regularly on my doorway chin up bar to do leg lifts-both bent and straight leg. I am a 65 year old female and will soon be able to do chin ups soon, too.
customer_reviews.author: VVV

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Ab Slings
customer_reviews.text: The stitching seems to be heavy duty, but they are not as comfortable as ones I have had in the past. They also did not come with the carabiners, which was disappointing as they show them in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Moody

customer_reviews.title: Solid strong ab straps
customer_reviews.text: Great price for these ab straps. I'm 6'3, 250 lbs and I've been using these daily for the last week. Feel great, and very sturdy, no tearing or stretching noises like they're struggling to stay stitched together while I'm holding me up. The straps are long enough to where my hands can't touch the pull bar while I'm hanging. My hands barely get to the carabiner while i'm doing leg lifts and knee raises so I can grab the straps right below the carabiner. Abs are sore right now from using these straps. Definitely a solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Commercial quality hanging ab straps
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Best case scenario. Delivered exactly what I expected: the highest quality ab straps I've seen, on time and at a reasonable price. The carabiners are the perfect (large) size to fit any standard sized pull-up bar. They will fit any normal gym equipment. The straps and webbing are of excellent commercial quality.
customer_reviews.author: MSS

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I spent a ton of time trying to research which one of these hanging knee products was the best. I think they are all the same... . I wasn't expecting the quality of this to be so rugged (which is a good thing) , heavy duty. The clasps are also pretty big which is good to go around most gymnasium bars.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Giorgetti

customer_reviews.title: These work great. Nice and wide to support your whole upper ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Nice and wide to support your whole upper arm. Very large carabiners. These make leg raises so much easier. All your energy goes into leg raises and not holding yourself up hanging by your arms.
customer_reviews.author: gho

customer_reviews.title: the quick relases connectors are the best and it's strong  and I weigh 250lbs
customer_reviews.text: Oh these are great and you can not beat the price. If your gym doesn't have thease you better tell them to get them now !!
customer_reviews.author: imagination.unlimited

customer_reviews.title: The AB Straps are incredibly well made and I feel ...
customer_reviews.text: The AB Straps are incredibly well made and I feel completely secure using them supporting my 180 lbs. They enable you to execute a variety of exercises to work your core so you can reach the peak of fitness.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Saleh

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great workmanship. Quality materials. Nothing bad about this product. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: HCS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome addition to my workout!!
customer_reviews.text: Holds me up with no problems!! I weight 280lbs!! Quality product!! Well made and built to last.
customer_reviews.author: PETER

customer_reviews.title: Best ab workout
customer_reviews.text: I get a much better ab workout with these straps. Body weight is taken off your shoulders and hands.
customer_reviews.author: BUGZ

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT come with carabiners!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’d love to say AWESOME, but now have to order the other hardware. I should have ready the reviews. Amazon should update item to indicate they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The worked great. IAM 230 pounds and they hold my weight.
customer_reviews.author: JEB

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and durable. I hang them from c-clamps from the beam i my basement. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MCoer

customer_reviews.title: Worth A Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this Ab Strap. The strap is very comfortable and sturdy. It is sold with an oversized carbinger that will allow you to attach to majority of pull up bars of various sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Andre R

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for price
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty and the carabiners are well built. Better quality than I was expecting for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Hammer

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality but a little big
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for doing hanging ab exercises. I am a big guy - 6'4 230LB. I walk to the guy and carry my stuff and these are a touch bulkier than most and the hardware is extra heavy duty. great value a little over kill. a little lighter and less hardware would have made these a little more portable. Perfect if you are going to hook them up and leave them there.
customer_reviews.author: John knowles

customer_reviews.title: For AB fitness, helps for flat stomach
customer_reviews.text: These straps are great otherwise i would not be able to lift my self on the bars. Is great for keeping flat ABS
customer_reviews.author: shary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty and comfortable. Very satisfied with Purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: The straps are not adjustable and the clips move on Pull up bars in the Gym and Crossfit box I attend. So I’m back to doing it on my own which is harder on my shoulders but it feels better and safer. I’ve tried other straps and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: DANA SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Like new after 1 year of usage in commercial gym
customer_reviews.text: Like new after 1 year of usage in commercial gym. Perfect sturdy quality.
customer_reviews.author: gota

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to any pull up bar are these Ab straps. They click on easily and securely, and allow you to engage your abdominals and oblique muscles. These Ab Straps workout also help to reduce the strain on your neck and back when doing knee lifts, leg lifts, and knee twists.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend everyone to buy this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Looks even better than the picture. Looks very strong and durable. Thank you. Am extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Momodou Lamin ceesay

customer_reviews.title: You Need these!
customer_reviews.text: large strong clips that will fit over almost anything. Comfortable straps. A great buy that every serious athlete should have in their toolbox!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product made with good materials. The clips are very heavy duty all in all great product
customer_reviews.author: ruben casillad

customer_reviews.title: Each strap different!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately very disappointed. Received them today. Each one had a different type and size of the carabiner and also one strap was longer than the other. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Zaneta

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Clips are large to fit around any bar and straps are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: 904Fitness

customer_reviews.title: VERY substantial product
customer_reviews.text: These are much better than the cheaper ones offered here at Amazon. I use these every other day, it is amazing how fast you can tone up your abs with this. I'm a big guy (200 lbs) so I wanted the good ones with padding so it is comfortable. this is a VERY substantial well made product
customer_reviews.author: Taiji on Maui

customer_reviews.title: Good product and seller
customer_reviews.text: Hooks are great. Straps are solid and reasonable comfort. Mine was delivered with one hook only. Seller resolved beyond my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Lee

customer_reviews.title: The carabineers are to small to fit on the bar ...
customer_reviews.text: The carabineers are to small to fit on the bar. I had to pull the pin and the put them on the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: The straps were just as advertised and are just the quality I had hoped for. They came to me on time with no hassle. I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this machine, it is very high quality and has great attachments for doing all sorts of different exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Kelly

product_meta.title: 1UP Hanging AB Straps for Fitness, Core Pull Up Strap Body Workout
feature_bullets: Attach to any pull-up bar or multi-gym: the 1UP Fitness ab straps are fully adjustable for any pull up / chin up bar or multi gym
Easy to install : the 1UP Fitness ab straps are simple to install and detach from any bar
Extra padded cushions for extra comfort : comfortable, sweat-resistant cushion
Made from heavy duty material : strong material to hold on any pull up bar
Specifically designed to reduce stress : these ab slings are extra long and wide which will reduce the stress to the back of your arms
